title: Wessex CP6 Asset Management

title: Skip Pool Improvement Scheme

title: West Bengal Minor Irrigation Project
description: Performed decade-long remote sensing analysis for agricultural resource management.

title: Mining Area Environmental Impact Assessment
description: Analyzed environmental degradation and spatial coverage of mining regions.

title: Texture-Driven Regional Data Analysis
description: Research-focused regional analysis using advanced image segmentation and machine learning.
